content.description: Gabriel recently became a grandfather. During the delivery of the child, there was a small complication, and the family was noticeably upset. Gabriel was calm and showed little emotion as he did his best to reassure the family that everything would okay. However, a short time later while explaining events to his own mother, Gabriel became very upset, demonstrating much more emotion than he had at the time of the birth.
content.question: What principle of emotion is demonstrated by Gabriel in this scenario?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
